cont.entity_a: Better than TV speakers. Good digital sound quality.
cont.entity_b: Crisp, clean sound. Lacks bass and has very bright treble.

cont.entity_a: Ear cushions are more comfortable than Sennheiser's.
cont.entity_b: Hard clamp can cause discomfort and headaches. Small ear holes make it uncomfortable.

cont.entity_a: Charging the headphones is tricky and frustrating. The charging dock design is poor and makes contact difficult.
Volume control is difficult to find and use.
The range is limited; moving away from the base causes signal loss. Sound quality is good up to 15 feet from the processor.
Background hiss and occasional phase issues with IR headsets. Interference issues with plasma TVs. Background hiss due to cheap amplifier.
Set up is easy with a fiber optic cable.
Affordable price for the class of wireless headphones.
Sony's surround process is unusable. Short range and loose fit on the head.
cont.entity_b: Subpar build quality with weak plastic parts. Short cord limits movement. Portable with good clean sound quality.

cont.entity_a: Good for blocking road noise and filtering nuances in movies.
cont.entity_b: Good for blocking outside noise at home or office.
Plastic broke within months. One side stopped working.
